content.rendered:
Below you will find a list of important dates, school breaks, and Regents exam days for the 2024-2025 school year.  A full calendar is mailed to all families each year in August.

  • July 4: Independence Day – no classes
  • September 2: Labor Day – no classes
  • September 3-4: Superintendent’s Conference Days – no classes
  • September 5: Classes Begin
  • October 3: Rosh Hashanah – no classes
  • October 14: Columbus / Indigenous Peoples’ Day – no classes
  • November 5: Superintendent’s Conference Day – no classes
  • November 11: Veterans Day – no classes
  • November 27-29: Thanksgiving Recess – no classes
  • December 23 – January 3: Holiday Recess – no classes
  • January 6: Classes Resume
  • January 20: Martin Luther King Jr. Day – no classes
  • January 21-24: Regents Testing Days
  • January 29: Asian Lunar New Year – no classes
  • February 17-21: Mid-Winter Recess – no classes
  • April 14-18: Spring Recess – no classes
  • April 18: Good Friday – no classes
  • May 26: Memorial Day – no classes
  • June 10, 11 and 17-27: Regents Testing Days 
  • June 19: Juneteenth – no classes
  • June 26: Tentative Last Day of School *Each year, the last day of school can change based on the number of emergency closing days used.

View a printable one-page 2024-2025 calendar.

View the 2024-2025 religious observation calendar.
